resources.string: At least one backup file (#VAR1#) was not created with the current Admidio version (#VAR2#). It is strongly recommended not to restore outdated backup files.
Restore or delete a backup file.
This plugin replaces the german gender-specific language (e.g. Benutzer:innen) introduced with Admidio 4.1 with their original expressions.

With this the replacement file replacements.php of the plugin can be edited. After pressing the save button, a copy of replacements.php is first created for security reasons (replacements_save.php). The new data is then written and then the replacement file is read in again.
* * * ATTENTION * * * Syntax errors can cause the plugin to crash.
After the original language expressions have been restored, Admidio should be restarted.
A maximum of 3 backups can be created. Already existing files will be overwritten.\n\nAfter a backup has been restored, Admidio should be restarted.
The plugin authorization check failed. No menu item could be uniquely identified with this URL.\n\n=> #VAR1_BOLD#
An error occurred while opening the language file.
An error occurred while saving the language file.
The original expressions have been restored.
